message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our amazing product. I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to make a great deal. I'm offering it to you for $110.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's a bit steep for me.  Would you consider $90?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand it's a bit high, but I think my product is worth more than $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $105.
I appreciate you meeting me a bit, Alice.  How about we split the difference again and settle at $97?
I like the way you think, Bob! But I'm not quite ready to give up yet. I'll meet you halfway again and offer it to you for $102.50.
Alice, you're a tough negotiator! I'm willing to go up to $99, but that's my absolute best offer.
I appreciate your honesty, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $98, but I think we can do a bit better. I'll offer it to you for $98.50.
